thread.title: AbRam's car ride on Rohit Shetty's set
thread.title_full: AbRam's car ride on Rohit Shetty's set

author: Deccan
title: AbRam's car ride on Rohit Shetty's set
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 11, 2015, 20.50 pm Mumbai: Abram was spotted having fun in the lap of director Rohit Shetty on the sets of his upcoming film Dilwale. Looks like the little toddler already is getting comfortable on the sets. While papa Shah Rukh is at work. Rohit: Say dad I'm driving AbRam: I'm driving AbRam driving with Rohit... And Dad watching on the sets of Dilwale #abram #shahrukhkhan #rohitshetty #dilwale #car #driving @iamsrk @gaurikhan
A video posted by Shah Rukh Khan (@shahrukh_khan_lover) on Oct 10, 2015 at 1:57am PDT
 In this video, Abram is seen taking a car ride with Rohit Shetty on the set. Shah Rukh Khan ensures that he spends time with his kids and even while shooting for Happy New Year he would call little Abram to the sets at times. Tags: Bollywood entertainment Shah Rukh Khan Rohit Shetty AbRam Also Read Ranbir-Katrina's love nest costs them Rs 15 lakh a month Akshay, Amy, Prabhudeva at a special screening of 'Singh Is Bliing' Miley Cyrus and beau Patrick enjoy dinner date after cheating rumours First look: Govinda plays a superstar in 'Happy Ending'
